channel.title: Projects on Sai Subhakar T | saimj7
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sai Subhakar T | saimj7

item.title: Object Detection in Real-Time With a Webcam
item.description: Implementation of the recently outperforming Dark Net (YOLO) for object detection in real-time!

item.title: Face Detection in Real-Time with a Webcam
item.description: Implementation of the famous Viola-Jones algorithm for face detection in Python with a webcam!

item.title: GANs with Recurrent Connections
item.description: In this project, we investigate the capability of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs-DCGAN) with Recurrent Connections like LSTM/GRU in generating new signs from sparsely available Indian traffic signs. Our aim is to tackle the open-research problem of universal-regional dataset!

item.title: Detecting and Tracking Lane Lines on the Road
item.description: Detecting and tracking lane lines on the road for autonomous vehicles with OpenCV (Canny Edge Detection) in Python!
